about_the_game:
Pastopia is a third-person, open-world adventure where coding becomes your key in unlocking the mysteries of a forgotten world. 

Explore a beautifully crafted world filled with puzzles and challenges that inspire creative thinking. With your Golem A.I. companion by your side, you'll discover and develop coding skills as you play, using them to revive the lost memories of the past.

In Pastopia, you hold the power to create your world—all through the magic of code. Utilise the power of MiniScript and Python to unlock new possibilities with every puzzle you encounter. Whether you're spawning objects, building structures, or crafting unique solutions, your adventure is yours to create. 

Your A.I companion, Golem, is the bridge to elevating your creativity. By simply asking a question, Golem aids you with its coding knowledge, allowing you to freely experiment and bring your imagination to life in the vast, dynamic world of Pastopia.

A visually stunning, story-driven world:

Explore breathtaking environments, from towering sea stacks to ancient ruins, all brought to life by immersive soundscapes and a compelling narrative. These landscapes are memories themselves; and you, as a Walker of Memories, have the power to restore them.

You're never alone in Pastopia:

Journey through the land with a ragtag team including Golem, your loyal A.I. companion with a knack for solving and debugging code; and Thala, the wise narrator guiding you through the secrets of ancient worlds. 

Open-ended puzzles and exploration:

Players will naturally develop coding knowledge (MiniScript and Python) as they solve various puzzles using block codes and advanced scripting. With Golem's guidance, you can tackle each challenge your own way, unlocking endless possibilities!

Anyone can code:

No prior programming experience is required - just your curiosity and imagination! Ultimately, Pastopia is designed to prioritise gameplay, where coding becomes a natural part of your journey as you solve puzzles and unlock the mysteries of Memory Realms.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 (Monterey) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Integrated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Apple M1 Integrated Sound Card

  • OS: Windows 10 OS
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.0Ghz (Gen11 or later)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD graphics (Gen11 or later)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Not available

short_description: Become a Memory Walker in Pastopia and restore the mystical lands of Talmanu. In this open-world adventure, team up with your Golem A.I companion to explore vast environments, solve puzzles, and unleash your creativity. Discover the lost memories of Pastopia and shape your own adventure!
